Name: Prepare
Desc2: At 1 Stack, gain Shield. At 2 Stacks, gain Strong. At 3 Stacks, gain both Shield and Strong

Name: Heist
Desc2: Every two stacks, gain 1 resource of any kind.

Name: Gust
Desc: Deal 1 damage. Move Army left or right.
Desc2: Gain 1 Worker

Name: Flaming Vortex
Desc2: Deal 4 damage the Army that has the most health

Name: Homing Missile
Desc2: If targeting Dark Mage, deal 5 Ranged damage

Name: Hurricane
Desc: Deal 4 damage. Each stack applies to a different army.
Desc2: Deal 3 damage. Adjacent players may contribute to this spell when cast.

Name: Scry
Desc: Reveal the top card of a chosen division
Desc2: At 2/4 stacks, Reveal the second/third card of a chosen division.

Name: Shield of Elements
Desc: Apply Shield to the next player without a shield, starting with yourself.
Desc2: During Attack, if this has at least 1 stack, you may clear all resources on this spell to prevent the next debuff applied to you.

Name: Magma Storm
Desc2: Deal 3 damage to two different divisions

Name: Necromancy
Desc: Gain 1 Mage recruitment per damage taken.
Desc2: Gain 1 Worker recruitment per damage taken

Name: Vine Whip
Desc2: At 3 Stacks, Deal 2 damage total and gain Riposte

Name: Parry
Desc: Deal 1 damage. After retaliation, add Riposte to the next player (per stack).
Desc2: If you have Riposte, deal 4 damage and remove Riposte

Name: Trebuchet
Desc2: Melee: each player may contribute 1 :stone: to this spell.

Name: Squall
Desc2: Remove Burning. At 3 stacks, also remove Burning from a neighbor

Name: Flame Gambit
Desc: For each stack, guess a number 1-6. Roll a D6. If one of your guesses is correct, deal damage equal to the number of stacks.
Desc2: Place a marker on Casino for each stack. Your next Casino roll you may modify the roll +/- 1 for each marker.

Name: Fireball
Desc: Melee: Deal 2 Damage to two different Armies. Player takes Burning.
Desc2: Ranged: Add 1 :air: (for any number of stacks) to Deal 2 damage to two different Armies.

Name: Burning coals
Desc: Deal 4 damage and apply Damage Over Time (2). Caster takes Burning.
Desc2: Deal 5 damage. Caster takes Burning.

Name: Water Cannon
Desc2: Ranged: Deal 2 damage. At 3 stacks, move Boss one space

Name: Feast
Desc2: Gain 1 Mage

Name: Rapid Growth
Desc2: Sow 1 seed

Name: Strangling Weeds
Desc2: Melee: Add 3 Damage Over Time

Name: Binding Roots
Desc: Melee: Add Rooted debuff, deal 2 damage
Desc2: Ranged: Add Rooted debuff

Name: Rock Shield
Desc: Add a Shield to your town (max 1). At 2, 3 stacks, a neighbor may take a Shield token.
Desc2: Melee: If you have a Shield token, deal 3 damage and break the Shield.

Name: Spectral Rangers
Desc2: Scout 1, Ranged 2.

Name: Shield Bash
Desc: If you have a Shield token, deal 3 Melee damage and take damage to your shield.
Desc2: Any player gains a Shield token

Name: Clay Hut
Desc2: Gain 1 Worker

Name: Flood
Desc: Apply Vulnerable. Each stack applies Vulnerable to a different Army.
Desc2: If Army has Vulnerable, apply Confusion
